Property.Description: Defines the number of gain handles for the HI. The numbers in parentes describes the levels for the gain handles.

Property.DisplayName: Compression Ratio Extender (1: Extended CR to max 5, 0: Normal CR of max 3/4)
Property.Description: If set to 1, the Compression Ratio can be set to 5. Otherwise to 3.
Defines the maximum gain reduction in dB which can be applied by the Adaptive AGCO when a low battery condition is detected.

Property.DisplayName: Max Reduction relative to AGCO max (CBAS = True) or current AGCO setting (GN = False).
Property.Description: Defines whether the max reduction is relative to max AGCO (CBAS) or relative to current AGCO setting (GN)
